```{r}
library(shiny)
library(janitor)
library(ggplot2)

```

```{r}

#### UI ---------------------------------------------------------

ui_upload <- sidebarLayout(
 
  # sidebar ---------------------------------------------------------
   
  sidebarPanel(
    fileInput("file", "Data", buttonLabel = "Upload..."),
    textInput("delim", "Delimiter (leave blank to guess)", ""),
    numericInput("rows", "Rows to preview", 5, min = 1),
    hr(),
    
    checkboxInput("NAs", "Remove NAs?"),    
    
    selectInput('select',
                label = h3('ABV or IBU'),
                choices = c('ABV', 'IBU'),
                selected = 1),  
    
    # Input: radio button for plot choice
    radioButtons(inputId = 'plotChoice', 'Which plot?',
                 choices = c('Histogram', 'Boxplot')
                 ),    
    
    # Input: slider for number of bins
    sliderInput(inputId = 'bins',
                label = 'Number of Bins',
                min = 1,
                max = 50,
                value = 30),

    hr(),
    fluidRow(column(3, verbatimTextOutput('value')))
  ),

  
  # main ---------------------------------------------------------
  mainPanel(
    h3("Raw data"),
    tableOutput("preview1")
  )
)

ui_clean <- mainPanel(
    h3("Cleaner data"),
    tableOutput("preview2"),
  
  # Output: histogram
    plotOutput(outputId = 'distPlot')
)


ui_download <- fluidRow(
  column(width = 12, downloadButton("download", class = "btn-block"))
)

ui <- fluidPage(
  ui_upload,
  ui_clean,
  ui_download
)




#### SERVER ---------------------------------------------------------

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  
  # Upload ---------------------------------------------------------
  raw <- reactive({
    req(input$file)
    delim <- if (input$delim == "") NULL else input$delim
    vroom::vroom(input$file$datapath, delim = delim)
  })
  output$preview1 <- renderTable(head(raw(), input$rows))
  
 
  # Clean ----------------------------------------------------------
  tidied <- reactive({
    out <- raw()
    if (input$NAs) {
      names(out) <- na.omit(out)
    }
    
  })

  output$preview2 <- renderTable(head(tidied(), input$rows))
  
  # histogram ----------------------------------------------------------  
  
  output$distPlot <- renderPlot({
    
    beer <- tidied()
    
    if(input$select == 'ABV') {
      
    x <- beer$ABV
    bins <- seq(min(x), 
                max(x), 
                length.out = input$bins + 1)
    
    hist(x, 
         breaks = bins,
         col = '#75AADB',
         border = 'white',
         xlab = 'ABV',
         main = 'Histogram of ABV')
    }
    if(input$select == 'IBU') {
      
    x <- beer$IBU
    bins <- seq(min(x), 
                max(x), 
                length.out = input$bins + 1)
    
    hist(x, 
         breaks = bins,
         col = '#75AADB',
         border = 'white',
         xlab = 'IBU',
         main = 'Histogram of IBU')
      
    }
  })
  
 
  # Download -------------------------------------------------------
  output$download <- downloadHandler(
    filename = function() {
      paste0(tools::file_path_sans_ext(input$file$name), ".tsv")
    },
    content = function(file) {
      vroom::vroom_write(tidied(), file)
    }
  )
}


shinyApp(ui, server)

```
